name: hyper-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
